ZAHID AMAN yea it‚Äôs a pity to see people using bad language. Humanity is more important than religion. And we must be patient and intelligent to understand true enemy. We can‚Äôt let Sri Lanka become like Syria and Libya. US wants our Trincomalee harbour, mannar oil reserves and our water resources also they want to break the silk route China is building. So they plan to make war with China within Sri Lanka. So US and China won‚Äôt fight in their countries, Their homes will be safe, our only home will be destroyed! This is the big plan that Ranil is making the road easy! Bloody bastard and traitor. He should be hanged till death on front of al Sri Lanka for betraying all the  people. Isis is only a tool used by US to make a reason to come and interfere in Sri Lanka. If Muslims and Sinhalese began fighting the day after Easter attack then by now big blood bath and US army over ruling us by now. But our people were patient although government tried to fuel up people in every way! The best thing is it know these evil tactics and stay calm and understand the situation. The government is already a puppet but people should not be!!

ZAHID AMAN I agree with you! Ranil is is agent  of US and Israel. Ranil is doing the script given to him from USA and Israel. Maithri is put to behave like puppet. Ranil is master mind. He and Maithri knew of Easter bombing of course beforehand. Who can believe the shit that the info didn‚Äôt filter one level up from intelligent services!?? Who do they think the public is, a box of rocks ? Not able to think and understand! All this sitting around chairs and talking is just to waste time and divert our attention from the problem. This is how US and Israel manipulation work. They throw a bomb and create confusion and divide and rule and under our nose we forget the main problem, and soon they will get their agendas fulfilled like Syria and Libya! Enough talking around tables. We all know that Ranil and Maithri and many cabinet ministers were fully aware of the bombings and LET IT HAPPEN! And WANTED IT TO HAPPEN! You are to blame for betraying our motherland and for the deaths of innocents and victims who are suffering! What I say is this is not about religion. We as Sri Lankan‚Äôs must identify the real problem and real culprits despite religion and people of all religions should come to the streets together against Ranil and Maithri and all related politicians. We should also give a hint that we know US and Israel is behind all this. The more we behave like idiots reacting to their shit the more they have power and will manipulate us. The real enemy is out there! Not who we think.
Gihan Nanayakkara no I mean what Mervin says. Ranil and Maithri knew everything!! It‚Äôs true.
@Zarah Jazmy everyone need to understand what the main issue they targeting srilanka this not local terrorisam this is international teerorisam mainly u.s.a and israel included ...
He‚Äôs telling the truth! Although I don‚Äôt support him, what he is telling is 100% truth.
